revised_title: An Unusual Discovery of Hair and Bone Growth in Women
tldr: The author describes several cases of women who had unusual hair and bone growth in their reproductive systems. These growths included balls of hair, bones, and teeth found in the uterus and ovaries. The author discusses the challenges of understanding how these substances got into and out of the women's bodies and the possible explanations for their occurrence.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive system
